post_content_localized.en:
Valentine’s Day is approaching and we have the perfect romantic getaway to New York City

January is upon us! With the winter in full swing, it’s the perfect time to brighten up the season with a little romance! Valentine’s Day is always a day that inspires the lovers in all of us and there is always something magical about the city that sets the stage for a picture-perfect romantic getaway to New York City.

First stop: Times Square. Imagine popping the question, getting married or renewing your vows at this iconic location. Love in Times Square takes place February 14th, 2018 or just visit anytime between February 1 and 28th to check out Window to the Heart, a romantic art installment available for viewing all month.

If activity sets your hearts aflutter, lace up your skates at Wollman Rink in Central Park or Rockefeller Center and glide hand in hand while taking in the beautiful surrounding scenery.

A romantic getaway to New York City wouldn’t be complete without getting a unique view of the skyline at the Top of the Rock Observation Deck or One World Observatory…or even by strolling across the Brooklyn Bridge.

Continue the adventure with an overnight stay at The Manhattan Club and our Romance and Relax Package which includes wine, chocolate and Grab N Go Breakfast for two.

When you stay with us, our Concierge can make recommendations, reservations and give great insider tips of some of the best places to explore for your romantic getaway to New York City.
